attributes.action: Form a Coalition Government to deal with Covid Crisis.
attributes.additional_details: We face the greatest challenge since WW2. It is normal at such times to form a broad coalition Government. Current expert advisors have had their chance and have proved to not be up to the challenge. A wider range of expert epidemiologists with fresh ideas must now be consulted.
attributes.background: Create a coalition Government which should then seek advice from a broader range of expert and more tailored expert opinion to deal with current covid crisis.
